title: cant creat tournament team or join one ...
body: since some time i could not enter a practice game or custom as game crashes and disconnect right after spawning  but i didn't care but now i cant create a tournament team or join one  it displays error message , i asked a friend to invite but no use  it says "The following players can't be invited to your team. They may be in another team or ineligile to play Tournaments" i tried repair but it didn't solve the problem ...

replies.body: Heya, we don't know a lot about this yet so you should report this directly to the devs at the [Clash Discord](https://discord.gg/CV5tpb6).
